io.appium.java_client

Interface DeviceActionShortcuts

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    AndroidDeviceActionShortcuts, IOSDeviceActionShortcuts, MobileDriver<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AndroidDriver, AppiumDriver, IOSDriver, YouiEngineDriver

    public interface DeviceActionShortcuts

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getDeviceTime() 
      void hideKeyboard()
      Hides the keyboard if it is showing.

    • Method Detail

      • hideKeyboard

        void hideKeyboard()
        Hides the keyboard if it is showing. On iOS, there are multiple strategies for hiding the keyboard. Defaults to the "tapOutside" strategy (taps outside the keyboard). Switch to using hideKeyboard(HideKeyboardStrategy.PRESS_KEY, "Done") if this doesn't work.

      • getDeviceTime

        String getDeviceTime()
